name: Witchin' Kitchen
description:
REQUIRES A NEXUS TABLET OR ANDROID THAT CAN USE UNITY

Play as a witch potion shop seller.

- Squeeze the eyeballs

- Shake the potions

- Slice the meat

- Pour with accuracy

MAKE THE DREAMS!

Shepherd Cameron - Art, Programming
